job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: Five9 is a leading provider of cloud software for the enterprise contact center market bringing the power of the cloud to thousands of customers and facilitating more than three billion customer interactions annually Since 2001 Five9 has led the cloud revolution in contact centers helping organizations transition from legacy premisebased solutions to the cloud Five9 provides businesses with cloud contact center software that is reliable secure compliant and scalable which is designed to create exceptional customer experiences increase agent productivity and deliver tangible business resultsbrbrstrongThe rolebrbrstrongYou will be developing a Single Page Application and the required backend services using JavaScript C Nodejs and Java technologies for our core Call Center products Our SaaS team develops VOIP voice over IP Chat Email Predictive Dialing Agent Desktop Predictive and Progressive Dialing with an enormous data channel and Artificial Intelligence If you love having big goals real world challenges and making customers incredibly happy whilst fostering your obsessive need for perfect code and user experience this is the job for youbrbrAlong with coding you will be responsible for working with product managers other developers and designers on our agile team structure We love product engineers who lead the charge communicating with customers and delivering the most innovative intuitive application possible is a mustbrbrstrongRequired Skills brstrongulliMust have a Bachelors Degree or Masters Degree preference given to Computer Science Engineering and STEM majors  and suitable industry coding or opensource experience is welcome toolili02 years experienceliliExcellent problem solverliliPassionate about coding and customersliliStrong
